features: Large vertical zippered external front pocket holds guidebooks, jackets and headlamps
Security pocket under lid with key clip stores phone, keys and other small items
Hydration port allows for ease of tube passage outside of main compartment
Dual haul loops/carry handles permit hauling or clipping off at a snow anchor
N315r HT nylon 6,6 LCP fabric is a high tenacity nylon with a liquid crystal polymer ripstop grid
Removable framesheet and back panel for versatility and packability
Large, webbing pull-tabs for quick and easy, glove-friendly access
Pull-to-open / pull-to-close drawcord main compartment with a weather protective top flap
Top lid with WaterTight™ zipper can be extended or removed
Custom webbing daisy chains for lashing items, ice pick capture webbing accommodates a range of angles
